modName: NEW Ciri FOLLOWER From The Witcher 3 Game
summary: My Personal version of Cirilla Fiona Elen Riannon from the witcher 3 game with ultra quality textures, proper clothes and sword! Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b] [/b][/size][center][size=5][b][color=#8e7cc3]CIRILLA FIONA ELEN RIANNON[/color]

[size=3]Ciri is a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
　You can use this mod with no problem whatever body types you're using.
[size=4][color=#6d9eeb](Facelight by tktk ever raccomanded)[/color]
[/size][size=3]
[color=#8e7cc3][Follower detail][/color]
[/size]
Name : Cirilla
Race : Breton
Voice : Female Sultry
Body : UNP
Textures: Pride of Valhalla - Super HD Skin Set for UNP by Dracofish aka MelissaGT
(Midgard version)
Weight : 40
Default Armor : Ciri Default Armor
Default Spell : Various Shouts
Location : Temple of Kynaret - Whiterun
Combat Style : 2h combat
[size=2][size=3]She is Merriable and unkillable
[/size]
[/size][size=4][color=#8e7cc3][Special Thanks]

[b]Dracofish aka MelissaGT[/b]
Calyps
Kalilies
Apachii
Zzjay[/color]
